topic.title: Accessibility
topic.shortdesc: Describes the WebHelp Responsive accessibility support.

body.p: Oxygen XML WebHelp Responsive output is compliant with the Section 508 accessibility standard, making the output accessible for people of all abilities.
Generally speaking, the WebHelp Responsive output has two major parts: topic content and WebHelp Responsive-related components (publication TOC, breadcrumb, menu).
While the WebHelp Responsive components are designed to comply with the accessibility rules, it is important to adhere to some rules when you write DITA topics so that the content is also accessible.
